General.Name: Vietnam Airlines JSC
General.Description: Vietnam Airlines JSC provides air transport services in Vietnam and internationally. The company engages in the air transportation of luggage, cargos, parcels, postal items, and mails; and general aviation activities. It also offers commercial, tourist, hotel, and duty-free shop services offered at airports, and in other provinces and cities; other aviation services; technical services for commercial grounds; other services at passenger and cargo terminals; and parking services at airports and airfields. In addition, it engages in the repair and maintenance of motor vehicles comprising maintenance of aircraft, engines, spare parts, aviation equipment, and other technical equipment; production of components, spare parts, aircraft materials, technical equipment, and others in aviation industry; provision of technical services, materials, and spare parts for local and international airlines, as well as forwarding and multimodal transport services; and export and import of aircraft, engines, spare parts, aviation equipment, and other goods. Further, the company offers manufactures, imports, and exports tools, instruments, and equipment serving the air transportation line; manufactures, processes, imports, and exports food to serve on aircraft; exports, imports, and supplies oil, gasoline, aviation grease, and other kinds of fuel; provides agent services to air carriers, aircraft engine, equipment, and spare parts; and offers construction and construction consultancy services. Additionally, it supplies labor; trades in real estate and e-commerce services; and offers training, finance and banking, and finance leasing services, as well as printing services. The company was founded in 1956 and is based in Hanoi, Vietnam.
